simple.description: Demodulation type. Liquid provides two different types of demodulation. One using a delay/conjugate method and one using a phase-locked loop.
The Bandwidth of the desired demodulation signal. This is used to calculate the Modulation Index. The bandwidth cannot be greater than 1/2 * Sample Rate.
The Modulation Index used in demodulation. This is calculated from dividing the Bandwidth by the Sample Rate. The Modulation Index must be a value between 0-1.
A read only property that shows the sample rate of the signal.
